results.description:
This is our very first meetup! So we chose Getting started with Freelancing as a topic.

Freelance The Hague is for freelancers in all fields, from developers to marketeers to designers to project managers. If we team up we can share, learn en improve. And make some new friends :)

The first meetup is about Getting Started. As a freelancer you have to run a business on your own, so this can be quite challenging in the beginning. And if you already run smoothly, maybe you have other goals or some valuable tips.

We will start with a central talk about Getting Started with Freelancing. Then we will partner up and do some exercises. Afterwards youâ€™ll have a chance to mingle.

It will be at the Nomadz coworking space in Bink36. We can use it for free thanks to Erik from Nomadz ðŸ˜˜ (https://www.nomadz.nl)

Update about the starting time:

19:30 Gather and grab a drink
20:00 Start the meetup
21:30 Mingle
22:00 End

results.name: Getting Started with Freelancing

results.description:
On Monday the 10th of December Stijn Hoogenweegen will give a workshop on how to create a resume that companies actually want to see from freelancers.

Stijn is a consultant in connecting mobile developers with companies and had connected lots of people with lots businesses over the years.

Stijn will tell us what the common mistakes are and low hanging fruit to upping your resume game!

When you leave this workshop you will have a brand new resume that will have a lot more traction.

Make sure to bring what you have right now and preferably bring your laptop as well.

If you donâ€™t have a laptop you can do it on paper as well.

See you on the 10th!
results.name: Creating a resume that companies actually want to see

meta.description: Access Meetup events using a group, member, or event id. Events in private groups are available only to authenticated members of those groups. To search events by topic or location, see [Open Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/open_events).
